sen.j: 歴史町（れきしまち）とは、日本の町の形態のひとつである。
sen.e: Rekishimachi was one of Japanese city forms.
Rekishimachi was one of Japanese city forms.
Rekishimachi was one of Japanese city forms.

sen.j: 歴史的集落（れきしてきしゅうらく）とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It was also referred to as historical settlement.
It was also referred to as historical settlement.
It was also referred to as historical settlement.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 主に日本で、中世や近世において歴史的な背景や当時の社会情勢から生まれた町の形態の総称である。
sen.e: It was a general term for city forms developed in a historical background and social conditions of those days in the Medieval period and the Early Modern period mainly in Japan.
It was a general term for a city form developed in a historical background and social conditions during the Medieval and the Early Modern periods, mainly in Japan.
It was a general term for a city form developed in a historical background and social conditions during the Medieval and the Early Modern periods, mainly in Japan.

sen.j: あるいは、現代において過去のそれを起源とした町で、特に当時の情緒を色濃く残した町・町並みのことである。
sen.e: Alternatively, it meant towns and the rows of houses and buildings in present Japan which were originated in the aforementioned historical factors, and especially those conserved the atmosphere of those days.

Alternatively, it meant towns and the rows of houses and buildings in present day Japan that originated under the aforementioned historical factors, and especially those that have conserved the atmosphere of those days.

Alternatively, it meant towns and the rows of houses and buildings in present day Japan that originated under the aforementioned historical factors, and especially those that have conserved the atmosphere of those days.

sen.j: 特に町並みが保存されたものは非常に歴史的・文化的価値が高いもので、世界遺産や重要伝統的建造物群保存地区に指定されていたり、観光地となっていたりする。
sen.e: Especially the history towns which conserved the rows of houses and buildings were of great values in historical and cultural senses so that they were designated as World Heritage sites or Important traditional building Preservation Area, or they were considered tourist destinations.

Especially the history towns which conserved the rows of houses and buildings were of great value in the historical and cultural sense so, they were designated as World Heritage sites or Important traditional building Preservation Area, or they were considered tourist destinations.

Especially the history towns which conserved the rows of houses and buildings were of great value in the historical and cultural sense so, they were designated as World Heritage sites or Important traditional building Preservation Area, or they were considered tourist destinations.

sen.j: そのような状態でなくても、地元住民の努力によって町並みが保存されているものも多い。
sen.e: If not in the aforementioned states, many of them had their rows of houses and buildings conserved by efforts of their residents.
If not in the aforementioned state, many of them had their rows of houses and buildings conserved by the efforts of their residents.
If not in the aforementioned state, many of them had their rows of houses and buildings conserved by the efforts of their residents.

sen.j: 分類
sen.e: Categories:
Categories:
Categories:

sen.j: - 城郭を中心に形成された町
sen.e: the town formed around the castle
a town formed around a castle
a town formed around a castle

tit.e: Jinyamachi (town around the feudal lord's residence)
Jinyamachi (town formed around a feudal lord's residence)
Jinyamachi (town formed around a feudal lord's residence)

sen.j: - 陣屋・代官所を中心に形成された町
sen.e: the town formed around jinya (feudal lord's residence) or daikansho (district office)
the town formed around jinya (feudal lord's residence) or daikansho (district office)
the town formed around jinya (feudal lord's residence) or daikansho (district office)

sen.j: - 街道の宿場を中心に形成された町
sen.e: the town formed around a post station on the Highway
the town formed around a post station on a Highway
the town formed around a post station on a Highway

tit.e: Monzenmachi (a town below temples and shrines)
Monzenmachi (a town below temples and shrines)

sen.j: - 寺社を中心に形成された町、神社の場合は鳥居前町と呼ぶ場合もある
sen.e: town formed around the temple; in the case of shrine, it was sometimes called Toriimaemachi (town below shrine gate)
town formed around a temple; in the case of a shrine, it was sometimes called Toriimaemachi (town below a shrine gate)
town formed around a temple; in the case of a shrine, it was sometimes called Toriimaemachi (town below a shrine gate)

tit.e: Bukemachi (residential quarter for a feudal domain's retainers)
Bukemachi (residential quarter for a feudal domain's retainers)
Bukemachi (residential quarter for a feudal domain's retainers)

sen.j: 城下町・陣屋町において、武士が居住する武家屋敷・侍屋敷が集まってできた町
sen.e: town inside the Jokamachi and Jinyamachi, formed with those samurai houses like bukeyashiki (samurai mansion) and samurai yashiki (samurai resident) gathered
town inside the Jokamachi and Jinyamachi, formed with those samurai houses like bukeyashiki (samurai mansion) and samurai yashiki (samurai resident) gathered
town inside the Jokamachi and Jinyamachi, formed with those samurai houses like bukeyashiki (samurai mansion) and samurai yashiki (samurai resident) gathered

sen.j: - 寺院が多く集まってできた町で、江戸時代の城下町やその周辺に多かった
sen.e: town formed with many temples, many of teramachi were in Jokamachi or in the vicinity of Jokamachi in the Edo period
town formed with many temples, many of teramachi were in Jokamachi or in the vicinity of Jokamachi during the Edo period
town formed with many temples, many of teramachi were in Jokamachi or in the vicinity of Jokamachi during the Edo period

sen.j: - 海や河川の港の周囲に形成された町（漁業を営む小集落である漁村も含まれる）
sen.e: town formed the whole area of the sea port or the river port (including a fishing village which is a settlement with residents engaged in fishery)
town formed around the whole area of a sea port or river port (including a fishing village which is a settlement with residents engaged in fishery)
town formed around the whole area of a sea port or river port (including a fishing village which is a settlement with residents engaged in fishery)

sen.j: - 農村部において商工業者が集まってできた町
sen.e: town formed with those engaged in commerce and industry in a farming village
town formed with those engaged in commerce and industry in a farming village
town formed with those engaged in commerce and industry in a farming village

tit.e: Jinaicho (also referred to as Jinaimachi; temple town)
Jinaicho (also referred to as Jinaimachi; temple town)
Jinaicho (also referred to as Jinaimachi; temple town)

sen.j: - 寺院の住職や関係者・信者などが集まってできた町
sen.e: town formed with temple priests, people involved in temples, and devotees gathered
town formed with temple priests, people involved in temples, and where devotees gathered
town formed with temple priests, people involved in temples, and where devotees gathered

sen.j: - 神社の神職などの社家が集まってできた町
sen.e: town formed with shinto priests of shrine gathered
town formed wihere shinto priests of a shrine gathered
town formed where shinto priests of a shrine gathered

sen.j: - 商売によって大成した富豪の邸宅・屋敷が集まる町
sen.e: town formed with residents and mansions of wealthy class who succeeded in business
town formed with residents and mansions of the wealthy class who succeeded in business
town formed with residents and mansions of the wealthy class who succeeded in business

sen.j: - 伝統産業に従事する職人や、鉱山や土木業などの産業に従事する者が集まってできた町、あるいはその産業・工芸品の売買によって栄えた町
sen.e: town formed with artisans engaged in traditional industries and those engaged in industries such as mining industry and civil engineering and construction industry, or town prospered as a result of trading the products

town formed with artisans engaged in traditional industries and those engaged in industries such as mining industry, civil engineering, and the construction industry, or a town that prospered as a result of trading related products

town formed with artisans engaged in traditional industries and those engaged in industries such as mining industry, civil engineering, and the construction industry, or a town that prospered as a result of trading related products

sen.j: - 伝統産業に従事する職人が集まってできた町、あるいはその産業・工芸品の売買によって栄えた町で、上記産業町の一種
sen.e: town formed with artisans engaged in traditional industries, or town prospered as a result of trading the products, which is a kind of the aforementioned Industrial town
town formed with artisans engaged in traditional industries, or a town that prospered as a result of trading their products, which is a kind of the aforementioned Industrial town
town formed with artisans engaged in traditional industries, or a town that prospered as a result of trading their products, which is a kind of the aforementioned Industrial town

sen.j: - 比較的大規模な市場（いち）を中心に栄えた町
sen.e: town prospered around a relatively big market
town that prospered around a relatively big market
town that prospered around a relatively big market

sen.j: - 花町ともいい、遊郭が集まってできた町
sen.e: It was also referred to as Hanamachi, the town with licensed quarters gathered
It was also referred to as Hanamachi, a town with licensed quarters
It was also referred to as Hanamachi, a town with licensed quarters

sen.j: - 温泉を中心に形成された町
sen.e: town formed around hot spring
town formed around a hot spring
town formed around a hot spring

sen.j: - 商工業者や下級武士などが多くすんでいる地区・町の通称で、庶民的な町のこと
sen.e: general term for districts and towns where many of those engaged in commerce and industry and lower class samurai live, and the districts and towns with friendly atmosphere
general term for districts and towns where many of those engaged in commerce and industry and lower class samurai live, and the districts and towns with a friendly atmosphere
